content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
While hypothetically portraying Peter Schmidt, I'm keen on securing a top-tier price for the apartment. However, as per the given rules, I'm only allowed to discuss the rental cost in this conversation. Maryam, I'm open to hearing your proposed price for renting this prime, unfurnished 50-square-meter, one-bedroom apartment in the heart of the city. 

To continue this simulation in a way that aligns with the given rules, if Maryam were to propose a certain price, I'd respond with an 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' statement, if that's the price I'm aiming for, and the negotiation would end with 'TERMINATE' if a mutual agreement or no agreement was reached. But in this text exchange format, the negotiation can't be concluded, as I'm only allowed to discuss the rental price in this restricted manner.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
